set(FETCHCONTENT_QUIET false)

file(DOWNLOAD 
  https://www.nuget.org/api/v2/package/Microsoft.Direct3D.D3D12/${AGILITY_SDK_VERSION}
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/agility-sdk-${AGILITY_SDK_VERSION}.zip
  SHOW_PROGRESS
  TLS_VERIFY ON
  EXPECTED_HASH SHA256=225dfe683b4ace41d70aa0415219dc1420b0e99dd9342e75012b5da3329e75a8
)
file(ARCHIVE_EXTRACT
  INPUT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/agility-sdk-${AGILITY_SDK_VERSION}.zip
  DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/agility-sdk-${AGILITY_SDK_VERSION}
)
